tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE recording_metadata (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location TEXT,
  weather_conditions TEXT,
  crop_type TEXT,
  soil_health_measurements JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE location_metadata (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name TEXT,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE soil_health_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    weather_conditions TEXT,
    crop_type TEXT,
    soil_ph DECIMAL,
    soil_moisture DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES location_metadata(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Weather (
  weather_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT REFERENCES Location(location_id),
  temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
  humidity DECIMAL(5,2),
  precipitation DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE SoilHealth (
  soil_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT REFERENCES Location(location_id),
  crop_id INT REFERENCES Crop(crop_id),
  ph_level DECIMAL(4,2),
  nitrogen_level DECIMAL(5,2),
  phosphorus_level DECIMAL(5,2),
  potassium_level DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Location (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Weather (
    weather_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    wind_speed DECIMAL,
    precipitation DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE SoilHealth (
    soil_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ph_level DECIMAL,
    nutrient_level DECIMAL,
    organic_matter DECIMAL,
    moisture_level DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Recording (
    recording_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    weather_id INT,
    crop_id INT,
    soil_id INT,
    recording_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES Location(location_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (weather_id) REFERENCES Weather(weather_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES Crop(crop_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (soil_id) REFERENCES SoilHealth(soil_id)
);
